ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, ya I was surprised when I found him too.  I tried talking to him, but it seemed like he didn t have much to say at the time. Zilligan ... From: Kevin
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, ya I was surprised when I found him too. I tried talking to him, but
it seemed like he didn't have much to say at the time.

Zilligan
----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 9:18 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


> From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
>
> Yes, I have seen him. You won't believe who it is either! =) I have not
been
> able to talk to him yet, but a lot of quest raise your faction with him so
I
> bet if you do enough quest he will talk to you.
>
> -Kevin
>
> Zach Heaven wrote:
>
> > From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
> >
> > Off topic here, no need to reply, just delete. I'm
> > sending it to Tinkering because it's Gnome specific.
> >
> > In Ak'anon, if you're heading towards the warriors
> > guild, but hitch a left and go out over the water into
> > the spires that hold a few shops you'll occasionally
> > notice something:
> >
> > King Ak'anon begins to cast a spell.
> >
> > Has anyone SEEN the King? I can't find him. And I
> > wonder if you COULD talk to him, if he would send you
> > on some really wild quests.
> >
> > Please make sure I'm not smoking crack on this one,
> > because I SWEAR I receive that message when I'm out
> > over the water on those shops.
> >
